videos.description: T.J. McConnell gets a steal and throws up a lob to Kelan Martin for the fast-break dunk for the Pacers.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (McConnell's steal sets up Martin's dunk) 2021/05/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: McConnell's steal sets up Martin's dunk
